description.p: FreeCAD is a 3D Computer Aided Design (CAD) application that focuses on Parametric modeling -- where the user specifies the geometric size, position and rotation of objects. FreeCAD can import and export to a wide range of formats, including STEP, IGES, OBJ, STL, DXF, SVG, STL, DAE, IFC, OFF, and NASTRAN, and can also export for 3D printer formats. It also features a modular architecture so you can easily script tasks, a sketcher with a constant solver, robot simulation, drawing sheets, and a 3D Renderer.
